metadata.description:
To stop a psychic bomb that threatens to render all of humanity catatonic, the last Dream Voyager awakens! When the evil Zeirio goes on a rampage throughout the Dreamworlds, it’s up to a new generation of the Dream Gang to put him down. From the fertile mind of Brendan McCarthy—the cowriter/designer of Mad Max: Fury Road and a contributor to Dark Horse Presents and 2000 AD! 

Collects Dream Gang chapters from DHP #1–#4, #7–#10, and #14–#17. 

Features new artwork and remastered lettering for this collection. 

“Brendan McCarthy’s art with the bright, trippy coloring looks great in or out of context.”—AiPT!
metadata.name: Dream Gang
